title: //h2/a
author: substring-before(substring-after(//span[@class='byline'], 'by'), ',')
date: substring-before(substring-after(//span[@class='byline'], ','), '|')
body: //div[@class='entry']

# tidy kills the center tag, so disable it
tidy: no
strip: //center//table
